title: SET_ENTITY_ALPHA
content:
0x44A0870B7E92D7C00xAE667CB0// SetEntityAlpha
void SET_ENTITY_ALPHA(Entity entity, int alphaLevel, BOOL skin);Parameters:entity: The entity to change the alpha for.alphaLevel: The alpha level ranges from 0 to 255, but changes occur every 20% (every 51).skin: Whether or not to change the alpha of the entity's skin.This native sets the entity's alpha level.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#SetEntityAlpha(PlayerPedId(), 51, false)
codeBlocks:
// SetEntityAlpha
void SET_ENTITY_ALPHA(Entity entity, int alphaLevel, BOOL skin);
